advantages.metaTitle: Competitive Advantages - Zexfro | Why Choose Us
advantages.metaDescription: Discover Zexfro's competitive advantages in international trade.
advantages.pageDescription: At Zexfro International Limited, our strength lies in our ability to connect global markets with Bangladesh efficiently, reliably, and transparently.

globalNetwork.subtitle: Trusted Partnerships Across Multiple Countries
globalNetwork.description: We maintain verified partnerships enabling seamless sourcing and delivery of quality products.
globalNetwork.intro: Zexfro International Limited has built a powerful and diversified global network of verified suppliers and international buyers.
globalNetwork.capability1: We work with manufacturers, exporters, and distributors across Asia, Africa, Europe, USA, and the Middle East
globalNetwork.capability2: Our supplier connections allow us to source high-quality products, rare commodities, industrial parts, and agricultural equipment
globalNetwork.capability3: We ensure every supplier undergoes background verification, trade compliance checks, and product quality assessment
globalNetwork.exportsDesc: We connect Bangladeshi producers with buyers in multiple global regions. Our buyer network includes wholesalers, importers, retailers, and industry-based procurement partners.
globalNetwork.partnershipsDesc: Our business relationships are built on trust, consistency, and contractual transparency.
globalNetwork.benefit1: Access to multiple sourcing options for price comparison
globalNetwork.benefit2: Reduced procurement risk with verified partners
globalNetwork.benefit3: Faster response time due to direct supplier communication
globalNetwork.benefit4: Ability to fulfill both small and bulk shipment orders
globalNetwork.benefit5: Consistent export demand for Bangladeshi goods
globalNetwork.conclusionDesc: With our strong supplier and buyer ecosystem, we empower businesses to import smarter and export bigger.

logisticsSupport.metaTitle: Logistics & Supply Chain - Zexfro | Comprehensive Logistics Solutions
logisticsSupport.metaDescription: Zexfro provides end-to-end logistics and supply chain management.
logisticsSupport.pageDescription: Comprehensive end-to-end supply chain management solutions designed to streamline your global trade operations with efficiency, reliability, and complete transparency.

overview.title: Complete Supply Chain Solutions
overview.subtitle: From origin to destination, we manage every aspect of your logistics operations to ensure seamless, efficient, and cost-effective global trade.
overview.freightDesc: Expert coordination of air, sea, and land freight services to ensure your cargo reaches its destination on time and within budget.
overview.warehousingDesc: Secure storage facilities with inventory management systems to keep your products safe and accessible when you need them.
overview.customsDesc: Full documentation support and customs brokerage services to ensure smooth border crossings and regulatory compliance.
overview.trackingDesc: 24/7 visibility into your shipments with advanced tracking technology and automated status notifications.
overview.networkDesc: Extensive network of trusted partners and carriers spanning all major trade routes and destinations worldwide.
overview.riskDesc: Comprehensive insurance coverage and contingency planning to protect your cargo against unforeseen circumstances.

transportation.title: Multi-Modal Transportation
transportation.subtitle: Flexible shipping options tailored to your specific needs, timeline, and budget requirements.
transportation.airDesc: Fast, reliable air cargo services for time-sensitive shipments. Ideal for high-value products, perishables, and urgent deliveries requiring speed over cost.
transportation.seaDesc: Cost-effective ocean shipping for bulk cargo and large volumes. Full container load (FCL) and less than container load (LCL) options available.
transportation.landDesc: Efficient road and rail freight services for domestic and cross-border shipments. Door-to-door delivery with real-time GPS tracking.

process.title: Our Logistics Process
process.subtitle: A streamlined approach to managing your supply chain from end to end
process.step1Desc: We analyze your requirements and create an optimal logistics strategy tailored to your needs.
process.step2Desc: Complete preparation of all required customs and shipping documents for smooth processing.
process.step3Desc: Execution of freight movement using the most efficient and cost-effective transportation mode.
process.step4Desc: Real-time monitoring and final delivery confirmation with complete shipment visibility.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our Logistics Services
benefits.subtitle: Experience the advantages of working with a trusted global logistics partner
benefits.efficiencyDesc: Optimized routing and scheduling ensure your cargo arrives on schedule. Our average on-time delivery rate exceeds 98%, minimizing delays and keeping your supply chain moving smoothly.
benefits.securityDesc: Your cargo is protected with comprehensive insurance coverage and secure handling procedures. We maintain the highest standards of safety throughout the entire logistics chain.
benefits.transparencyDesc: Real-time tracking and automated notifications keep you informed at every stage. Access detailed shipment information anytime through our online portal or mobile app.
benefits.reachDesc: Our extensive network of trusted partners spans over 150 countries, ensuring reliable service wherever your business takes you. From major trade hubs to remote locations.

cta.title: Ready to Optimize Your Supply Chain?
cta.description: Partner with Zexfro for reliable, efficient, and cost-effective logistics solutions that drive your business forward. Contact us today for a free consultation.

qualityAssurance.metaTitle: Quality Assurance - Zexfro | International Trade Standards
qualityAssurance.metaDescription: Zexfro International Ltd ensures quality through verified partners, regulatory compliance, real-time monitoring, and alignment with international standards for reliable global trade operations.
qualityAssurance.pageDescription: Zexfro International Ltd's quality assurance model ensures that every aspect of international tradeâ€”from supplier vetting to final deliveryâ€”meets the highest standards of quality, compliance, and reliability.

overview.cardDesc: Comprehensive quality assurance framework ensuring reliable, compliant, and high-standard international trade operations.
overview.intro: Zexfro International Ltd is a Dhaka-based import, export, and global trade services company that facilitates international trade by connecting verified partners, managing logistics, and handling product sourcing and distribution. Our quality assurance approach is integrated into every aspect of our operations.
overview.coreTitle: Core Elements of Zexfro's Quality Assurance
overview.coreDesc: While Zexfro does not publicly publish an extensive standardized Quality Assurance manual, the company highlights several commitments related to quality compliance and partner/product standards. Our approach ensures that quality is maintained throughout the entire trade cycle.
overview.pillar1: Verified Network: All partners vetted for reliability and compliance
overview.pillar2: Regulatory Compliance: Full adherence to international trade laws and standards
overview.pillar3: Transparent Operations: Real-time tracking and monitoring throughout the supply chain
overview.pillar4: International Standards: Alignment with global quality norms and expectations
overview.bannerDesc: From supplier selection to final delivery, quality assurance is embedded in every aspect of our operations.

partnerVetting.cardTitle: Quality Control at the Network Level
partnerVetting.cardDesc: Comprehensive vetting processes ensure only reliable, compliant partners enter our network.
partnerVetting.intro: Zexfro's platform emphasizes quality control at the network level through rigorous partner evaluation and product vetting. This proactive approach ensures that only verified, reliable partners are part of our ecosystem, protecting both buyers and sellers from potential risks.
partnerVetting.verificationDesc: All partners are vetted before entering the network to ensure reliability and compliance. Our verification process includes:
partnerVetting.verificationItem1: Business registration and legal status verification
partnerVetting.verificationItem4: Compliance with local and international regulations
partnerVetting.verificationItem6: References from previous clients and partners
partnerVetting.productDesc: Products offered through the platform are required to meet international quality standards, which helps protect buyers from low-quality or non-compliant goods. We ensure that all products align with recognized industry benchmarks and certification requirements.
partnerVetting.riskDesc: This vetting process functions as a key quality assurance mechanism by evaluating suppliers before trade begins, reducing risk for importers and exporters. By implementing rigorous screening protocols, we eliminate potentially problematic partners before they can impact our clients' operations.
partnerVetting.bannerTitle: Quality Starts with the Right Partners
partnerVetting.bannerDesc: Our rigorous vetting process ensures that every partner in our network meets our high standards for reliability and quality.

compliance.cardDesc: Full regulatory compliance with international trade laws, especially European Union trade regulations.
compliance.intro: Zexfro operates under a strong compliance framework that ensures all trade operations meet legal and safety standards required for international commerce. Our commitment to regulatory compliance is a fundamental aspect of our quality assurance approach.
compliance.commitment1: The company ensures full regulatory compliance with relevant trade laws, especially European Union trade regulations
compliance.commitment2: Compliance is part of our quality assurance focus, ensuring that cross-border movement of goods meets legal and safety standards
compliance.commitment3: All documentation is prepared according to international standards and destination country requirements
compliance.beyondDesc: Quality assurance at Zexfro isn't only about product integrity but also about meeting legal and logistical standards required in international trade. This comprehensive approach ensures that every aspect of the trade process adheres to regulatory requirements.
compliance.euDesc: Zexfro maintains specialized expertise in European Union trade regulations, ensuring smooth trade operations with EU member states. This includes:
compliance.euItem1: CE marking requirements and conformity assessments
compliance.euItem2: REACH and RoHS compliance for chemicals and electronics
compliance.euItem3: EU customs procedures and tariff classification
compliance.euItem4: Origin certification and preferential trade agreements
compliance.bannerDesc: Our strong regulatory framework ensures legal, safe, and standard-compliant international trade operations.

monitoring.cardDesc: Real-time tracking and automated updates ensure transparency and early issue detection.
monitoring.intro: One way Zexfro supports quality assurance is through real-time tracking and automated updates of shipments and orders. This transparency-focused approach allows clients to monitor their goods throughout the entire supply chain journey, from origin to final delivery.
monitoring.benefit1: Clients can track goods throughout the supply chain from origin to delivery
monitoring.benefit2: This increases transparency and helps identify and resolve issues early â€” a quality assurance approach in logistics and delivery
monitoring.benefit3: Automated notifications keep all stakeholders informed of shipment status and milestones
monitoring.serviceDesc: While this isn't traditional "product quality control," it ensures that the overall service quality offered by the company adheres to international expectations for reliability and traceability. Real-time monitoring serves as a quality assurance tool by enabling proactive problem-solving and continuous oversight.
monitoring.bannerDesc: Real-time monitoring ensures service quality, reliability, and traceability that meet international expectations.

standards.cardDesc: Alignment with internationally recognized quality standards and trade requirements.
standards.intro: Although Zexfro does not list specific certificates (like ISO 9001) on its website, its emphasis on "products meet international quality standards" implies alignment with global norms commonly expected in global trade. This commitment ensures that all products and services meet the quality expectations of international markets.
standards.goodsDesc: Ensuring all products meet recognized industry standards such as ISO, ASTM, IEC, and other relevant quality benchmarks appropriate to the product category.
standards.requirementsDesc: Products and documentation meet the specific requirements of both origin and destination countries, including safety, labeling, and certification requirements.
standards.credibilityDesc: Confirming that manufacturers hold appropriate certifications and maintain quality management systems that align with international best practices.
standards.marketsTitle: Adherence to Regulatory Frameworks in Target Markets
standards.marketsDesc: Understanding and meeting the specific regulatory and quality requirements of destination markets, including EU, North American, and Asian standards.
standards.reputationDesc: This type of assurance is typical for international trading firms whose reputation depends on delivering high-quality and compliant products to their clients. Our success is built on maintaining these standards consistently across all transactions and partnerships.
standards.bannerDesc: Our commitment to international standards ensures products meet quality expectations across all markets.

practice.cardDesc: How Zexfro's quality assurance model works in day-to-day operations.
practice.intro: In effect, Zexfro's quality assurance model includes comprehensive practices that span from initial supplier contact through final product delivery. Our practical approach ensures quality at every touchpoint of the international trade process.
practice.step1Item2: Ensuring legitimacy and compliance before onboarding
practice.step2Item1: Evaluating whether offered goods conform to recognized standards
practice.step2Item2: Preventing the sale or promotion of substandard items
practice.step3Item1: Meeting legal requirements in key markets, especially within the EU
practice.step4Item1: Visibility in logistics and shipping to detect issues early
practice.step4Item2: Enabling client confidence through tracking and notifications
practice.comparisonDesc1: Traditional quality assurance systems (like ISO 9001) involve documented Quality Management Systems (QMS), internal audits, corrective actions, and continuous improvement programs. Zexfro's public materials highlight quality control practices oriented toward proactive partner vetting and regulatory compliance rather than listing formal ISO certifications or detailed documented QA processes on their website.
practice.comparisonDesc2: However, the emphasis on verified partners and meeting "international standards" signals a quality-oriented approach that aligns with basic principles of quality assurance, particularly in global trade.
practice.strength1: Preventing low-quality products from entering the system â€” Proactive vetting stops problems before they start
practice.strength2: Ensuring consistent quality through vendor checks â€” Continuous monitoring and evaluation of suppliers
practice.strength3: Providing transparency in delivery and compliance â€” Real-time visibility builds trust and enables quick action
practice.actionTitle: Quality Through Action, Not Just Words
practice.actionDesc: Our practical quality assurance approach ensures every transaction meets the highest standards of reliability and compliance.
practice.ctaDesc: Partner with Zexfro International Ltd and benefit from our comprehensive quality assurance framework that ensures reliable, compliant, and high-standard international trade operations.

complianceStandards.metaTitle: Compliance & Standards - Zexfro | International Trade Excellence
complianceStandards.metaDescription: Zexfro International Limited maintains strict compliance with international laws, ethical sourcing standards, and quality benchmarks for trusted global trade operations.
complianceStandards.pageDescription: At Zexfro International Limited, we recognize that trust is the primary currency in global trade. Operating in the exportâ€“import sector requires more than just logistics; it requires rigid commitment to international laws, ethical sourcing, and quality benchmarks.

documentationCompliance.metaDescription: Zero International Limited operates under a comprehensive documentation and compliance framework ensuring full legal validity, transparent trade operations, and smooth international business activities.
documentationCompliance.pageDescription: Zero International Limited operates under a comprehensive documentation and compliance framework to ensure full legal validity, transparent trade operations, and smooth international business activities. All processes strictly follow the regulatory requirements of Bangladesh and applicable international trade standards.

faq.metaDescription: Find answers to common questions about Zexfro International Ltd's import-export services, compliance, shipping, and more.
faq.pageDescription: Everything you need to know about trading with Zexfro International Ltd. Find answers to common questions about our services, compliance, and processes.
faq.introDescription: Browse through our frequently asked questions to find quick answers. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.homeSectionSubtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: What does Zexfro International Ltd. do?
q1.answer: Zexfro International Ltd. is a Bangladesh-based export-import trading company that connects global suppliers and buyers. We import quality products from international markets and export Bangladeshi goods worldwide, supported by end-to-end trade and logistics services.

q2.question: Where is Zexfro International Ltd. located?
q2.answer: Our head office is located in 9/B, Sector 8, Uttara, Dhaka-1230, Bangladesh. We operate in the Bangladesh Standard Time zone (UTC +06:00).

q3.question: Is Zexfro a government-registered company?
q3.answer: Yes. We are fully registered under the Registrar of Joint Stock Companies & Firms (RJSC), Bangladesh, and operate with a valid Trade License, IRC, and ERC.

q4.question: What compliance certificates does Zexfro International Ltd. hold?
q4.answer:
We maintain all mandatory Bangladesh trade and tax registrations, including:
  • Trade License (DNCC)
  • TIN (Tax Identification Number)
  • IRC (Import Registration Certificate)
  • ERC (Export Registration Certificate)

q5.question: How do you ensure smooth customs clearance?
q5.answer:
Every consignment is supported with complete documentation such as:
  • Commercial Invoice
  • Packing List
  • Bill of Lading / Airway Bill
  • Certificate of Origin (COO) when required
  • Insurance and banking authorization documents (e.g., LC, LCAF)
This eliminates clearance delays and ensures legal compliance.

q6.question: Do you support LC (Letter of Credit) based trade?
q6.answer: Yes. We handle LC-based import and export transactions following UCP 600 standards through authorized AD banks in Bangladesh.

q7.question: How reliable is your shipping process?
q7.answer: We offer Faster Shipment & Reliable Delivery Commitment, ensuring goods move efficiently through Chattogram Sea Port, Dhaka ICD, and Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport Cargo, depending on the shipment mode.

q8.question: Which Incoterms do you use?
q8.answer: We follow Incoterms 2020, including FOB, CIF, CFR, EXW, DDP, and others depending on buyer-seller agreements.

q9.question: How do you ensure product quality?
q9.answer: We source from verified international suppliers and ensure all imported/exported goods meet the agreed specifications. When required, we support third-party inspections and quality verification before shipment.

q10.question: What types of products do you trade?
q10.answer:
We trade a wide range of products including:
  • Agricultural goods
  • Industrial raw materials
  • Consumer products
  • Machinery and spare parts
(Products are traded based on global demand and partner requirements.)

q11.question: Do you trade with sanctioned countries or companies?
q11.answer: No. We strictly maintain AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and Sanction-free trade compliance. All suppliers and buyers go through KYC/KYB verification.

q12.question: How do you protect buyer and supplier information?
q12.answer: We maintain secure digital and physical document storage and never share partner information without authorization.

q13.question: Do you offer customer support?
q13.answer: Yes. Zexfro provides dedicated Communication & Customer Support to assist buyers and suppliers throughout the trade lifecycle.

q14.question: Can you handle large bulk orders?
q14.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in customized trade solutions and bulk order handling for global businesses.

q15.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q15.answer:
We support:
  • LC (Letter of Credit)
  • TT (Telegraphic Transfer / Bank transfer)
  • Other secure international payment terms based on agreements through AD banks.

q16.question: Do you provide a Proforma Invoice before order confirmation?
q16.answer: Yes. We issue Proforma Invoices to define product details, price, Incoterms, and delivery terms before final confirmation.

q17.question: Why choose Zexfro International Ltd.?
q17.answer:
Because we provide:
  • Strong global supplier-buyer network
  • Complete trade documentation and compliance
  • Fast and reliable logistics
  • Ethical and legally protected business
  • Trusted partnerships worldwide

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

about.pageDescription: A Journey of Excellence from 2018 to Present

evolution.title: Evolution into Zexfro International Limited
evolution.subtitle: A Journey of Excellence (2018 â€“ Present)
evolution.paragraph1: Founded in 2018 as a proprietorship, Zexfro International began with a clear vision: to bridge markets and deliver excellence in the world of trade. Over the past seven years, we have navigated challenges, embraced innovation, and remained steadfast in our commitment to quality.
evolution.paragraph2: Today, on September 14, 2025, we are thrilled to announce our official incorporation as Zexfro International Limited. This transition marks a new chapter in our historyâ€”one that reflects our growth from a dedicated local enterprise to a structured corporate entity.
evolution.celebrationDesc: We want to make September 14 memorable as we celebrate the founding anniversary of Zexfro International Limited. All buyers, sellers, and well-wishers will be invited to join us in commemorating this special milestone.

gratitude.title: Our Deepest Gratitude
gratitude.subtitle: We recognize that this success is not ours alone

buyers.title: Valued Buyers
buyers.description: Thank you for trusting our products and services. Your satisfaction has been our greatest reward.

suppliers.title: Trusted Suppliers & Vendors
suppliers.description: Your timely cooperation and commitment to quality have been the backbone of our operations.

wellWishers.title: Well-wishers & Stakeholders
wellWishers.description: Your prayers and encouragement have fueled our drive to succeed during this seven-year journey.

lookingAhead.title: Looking Ahead
lookingAhead.paragraph1: As Zexfro International Limited, we are more than just a trading company; we are your reliable partner in global commerce. Our mission remains the sameâ€”to provide seamless trade solutionsâ€”but our vision is now broader, aiming to set new benchmarks in the international arena.
lookingAhead.paragraph2: We humbly request your continued prayers and cooperation as we embark on this exciting new era. Together, let's build a future of shared prosperity.

whoWeAre.title: Zexfro International Ltd
whoWeAre.subtitle: Your trusted partner in global trade
whoWeAre.paragraph1: Zexfro International Ltd is a trusted and fast-growing Import-Export and Trading company established in Bangladesh, headquartered in Uttara, Dhaka. From the beginning, our core mission has been to connect global suppliers with the Bangladeshi market while ensuring premium quality, affordability, compliance, and customer satisfaction.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: We specialize in importing a diverse range of products from different countries around the world and distributing them across Bangladesh through a reliable marketing and supply network. Along with import and local distribution, we proudly contribute to Bangladesh's economy by exporting high-quality local products to international markets.

items: And many more based on market demand
imports.note: All imported goods are carefully sourced through strict quality inspection, compliance verification, and documentation standards to meet local regulatory and market expectations.

servicesGrid.subtitle: From shipping to compliance, we provide end-to-end services to make your international trade seamless and successful

services.title: International Shipping
services.description: Comprehensive sea, air, and land freight services to move your cargo efficiently across borders with real-time tracking and insurance coverage.

services.title: Customs Clearance
services.description: Expert customs documentation and clearance services ensuring compliance with international regulations and smooth border crossings for your shipments.

services.title: Trade Compliance
services.description: Navigate complex international trade regulations with our compliance services, including licensing, permits, and regulatory documentation support.

services.title: Export Documentation
services.description: Complete export documentation services including commercial invoices, certificates of origin, packing lists, and all required export paperwork.

services.title: Warehousing Solutions
services.description: Secure storage facilities at strategic locations worldwide with inventory management, cross-docking, and distribution services for your goods.

services.title: Market Research
services.description: In-depth market analysis and trade intelligence to help you identify opportunities, understand regulations, and expand into new international markets.

services.title: Trade Finance
services.description: Flexible financing solutions including letters of credit, trade credit insurance, and working capital facilities to support your import-export operations.

services.title: Supply Chain Optimization
services.description: End-to-end supply chain consulting to streamline operations, reduce costs, and improve efficiency across your international trade network.

services.title: Supplier Verification
services.description: Thorough due diligence and verification of international suppliers to ensure reliability, quality standards, and compliance with ethical practices.

services.title: Quality Inspection
services.description: Pre-shipment and on-site quality control inspections to ensure products meet specifications and international quality standards before dispatch.

services.title: Trade Analytics
services.description: Advanced data analytics and reporting tools to track performance, identify trends, and make informed decisions about your international trade operations.

services.title: Door-to-Door Delivery
services.description: Complete logistics management from origin to destination, including pickup, transportation, customs clearance, and final mile delivery services.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, transparent process to get your goods moving across borders

steps.title: Consultation & Assessment
steps.description: Share your export-import requirements with us. Our team analyzes your needs and creates a customized solution plan.

steps.title: Documentation & Compliance
steps.description: We handle all necessary documentation, permits, and ensure full compliance with international trade regulations.

steps.title: Logistics & Shipping
steps.description: Your cargo is transported via the most efficient route with real-time tracking and full insurance coverage.

steps.title: Delivery & Support
steps.description: Final delivery to destination with customs clearance, and ongoing support for any post-delivery requirements.

benefits.title: Benefits That Drive Success
benefits.subtitle: Experience the advantages of working with a trusted partner in international trade

items.title: 100% Secure & Compliant
items.description: All transactions are protected with bank-level security and full compliance with international trade regulations.

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Streamlined workflows and automated systems ensure quick turnaround times for all documentation and shipping.

items.title: Global Network
items.description: Access to a verified network of partners across 150+ countries for seamless international trade operations.

items.title: Cost Optimization
items.description: Leverage our volume discounts and optimized routes to reduce shipping costs by up to 30%.

items.title: Dedicated Support
items.description: 24/7 multilingual customer support team ready to assist you at every step of your trade journey.

items.title: Industry Expertise
items.description: Over 15 years of experience in international trade with certified customs brokers and logistics specialists.

items.title: Technology-Driven
items.description: Advanced tracking systems, real-time updates, and digital documentation for complete transparency.

items.title: Quality Guaranteed
items.description: Comprehensive quality checks and verification processes to ensure your goods meet all required standards.

stats.title: Numbers That Speak for Themselves
stats.description: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our performance metrics. We've helped thousands of businesses expand globally with reliable, efficient trade solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Expand Your Global Trade?
cta.description: Let's discuss how our comprehensive import-export services can help your business thrive in international markets
